TopicTitle: How to make custom engines effects?

Articles.Content: I just made a engine, and everything works perfectly, but, the default ksp engine effects are too small for it, I couldn't figure a way to make a engine effect with part tools, also didn't find any tutorials... if theres any documentation or tutorial on that, i would be very thankful :p.
